Notes: the set of concepts or propositions builds the content
'empty slots' on removal of propositions forms the network of relations.
a representation of the form in which information structures are coded in long-term memory.

Under this interpretation, one could employ the network structures defined here as data structures representing informational inputs such as texts or physical events, or as data structures against which subjects’ responses could be analyzed.

In this view, propositional structures defined without reference to grammatical rules cannot be regarded as a part of a linguistic description of text since the propositional structures represent only the semantic “deep structure” of “surface” sentences or texts.
